Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the slotted power a chance to Terrorize the target and reduce their damage for 10 seconds and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This effect will trigger roughly 4 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Soldiers of Arachnos and may be slotted into any Arachnos Soldier or Arachnos Widow damage power.
